text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
The time has finally come! 
Mile CS, 1600 meters!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
All the bloody efforts I have made thus 
far have brought me here today.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
From here on out, we'll increase the 
distance even further, to 2000m, 
2,500m… on the way to the ultimate 
peak of the Bakushin Road!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: And now, for the first step――

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
What's this? I'm in the Senior class
now, right? But, I'm still on the first
step…?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
What, what? In the first place, what is
the true meaning of Bakushin Road――
choice_data_list: L-let's just focus on the race first!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
choice_data_list: Let's win and become the "Strongest Miler"!
Let's win and become the "Strongest Miler"!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Roger that! 
Please imagine as if you're on the 
S.S. Bakushin!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I'll show you just how much I've 
grown in these past three years―!
